list: - I developed and implemented over 100 user interfaces using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and Nuxt Js by translating prototypes

jobDesc: This is a fintech Web application that helps its users in various parts of africa to make seamless paymnet transaction to Canada
list: - Implemented and enhanced a secure OTP (One-Time Password) authentication system, ensuring robust user verification.
- Developed a feature to automatically resend OTPs when the countdown timer expires, enhancing user experience and reducing potential login issues.
- Implemented and managed environment configurations using .env files to streamline application deployment and ensure consistent behavior across various environments.
- Worked in a team to implement complex user interfaces, ensuring alignment with project requirements and UX/UI guidelines.
- Utilized mixins to efficiently share and reuse common functionalities across multiple Vue components, promoting code reusability and maintainability.

job: Bitsin Travels and Tour - Frontend Engineer
jobDesc: This is a  hotel, and flight booking engine, that was built with Nuxt js , Bootstrap , VueBootstrap, css.
list: - Successfully resolved a critical authentication bug that was causing user login failures, improving the overall user experience and boosting user trust and satisfaction..
- Implemented Vuex for state management, ensuring consistent and efficient handling of application data across various components.
- I worked closely with the backend developers to consume API endpoints using Axios, ensuring seamless communication within the team..

- I utilized bootstrap's grid system and pre-built components, which  led to a significant reduction in development time and ensured a consistently responsive design across various devices and screen sizes .
- I implemented a robust state management system utilizing Vuex that handled the application state efficiently and also improved the maintainability and scalability of the code
- Utilized Vue Router to enable seamless navigation and dynamic page loading.
- implemented lazy loading for images and assets, resulting in a significant reduction in initial page load times and improving overall site performance.
- Worked closely with the design team to translate visual mockups into interactive web applications.
